products.name: Finishing Touch Flawless Salon Nails Kit
products.details: This at home manicure and pedicure nail kit includes 6 attachment heads that: buff, shine, shape and file.Rechargeable and cordless: this unit has forward and reverse settings, low and high power modes as well as an LED light to illuminate the nail.Designed with precision control which allows for easy use around your nails. Just like at your favorite salon.Have a safe and hygienic manicure in the safety of your own home

related.name: Hydrating Camo Concealer
related.details: High-coverage, longewearing and perfect for hiding those pesky spots and under-eye circles .Gives your skin a boost of hydration for a satin finish which doesn't flake.Use the wand to apply concealer to desired areas and pat out gently with your finger, brush or sponge .Available in 23 different shades. Cruelty-free, vegan and 100% free from Phthalates, Parabens, Nonylphenol, Ethoxylates, Triclosan, triclocarban.

related.name: Amazon Basics Make Up Remover Wipes
related.details: Two resealable 25-count packs of Amazon Basics Makeup Remover Wipes that cleanse, refresh and moisturize your face,These soft towelettes effectively remove all traces of dirt, oil and make-up - even stubborn, waterproof mascara,The formula is hypoallergenic, pH balanced, non-comedogenic and no harsh irritants while being dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested,Uses 15% less plastic than our previous packaging

products.name: FZANEST Rubber Base Gel NailPolish
products.details: Jelly Gel Nail Polish is a translucent nail polish. Different layer you apply have different effect,the fewer layers apply the more sheer and the more layers apply the more vibrant.FZANEST Jelly Gel Nail Polish is perfect for French manicures, or for health care professionals such as doctors and nurses, because it is a very natural nude or light pink color that gives a natural shine when applied to nails.Health, Safety & Environmental Protectio,FZANEST Gel Nail polish production from natural resin and other healthy material, it is safe and has low odor, will not harm your skin and nails, good gloss and long lasting generally 2 to 3 weeks.This translucent jelly gel nail polish needs to be cured under a LED/UV nail lamp. Base and Top coat required. Average for LED lamp 30-60 secs.Reminder:Cure under UV/LED nail dryer lamp,CURE TIME: Average for LED light 30-60 secs,UV light 2-4mins.

related.name: GAOY Sheer Light Pink Gel NailPolish
related.details: SHEER GEL POLISH: Apply several layers to build up the color from clear transparent to solid opaque.4 WEEKS LONG-LASTING: Buff your nail bed before base coat to give your nail texture. Apply top coat after color gel for shimmery jelly finish.CURE NEEDED: Cure under UV LED nail lamp for 60s to a complete dry.PACKAGE INCLUDES: 16ml (0.54 fl.oz) big volume bottle gel nail polish, 2pcs 16ml (0.54 fl.oz) top and base coat set, to enjoy the nail art from the comfort of your own home!.TOXICS FREE: Lower odor compared to traditional nail polish. All ingredients in strict compliance with FD&C Act and SGS certified.

products.name: Essie expressie Quick NailPolish
products.details: Expressie Quick Dry Nail Polish: Taxi Hopping, a green yellow with a cream finish, is a fast-drying nail polish so you can grab, apply, and dry on the fly. One step color & shine formula that dries in about a minute. One-Step Nail Color: Apply 2 coats of any expressie nail polish color on clean nails and let dry for about a minute. No base or top coat needed. Follow with essie apricot cuticle oil for added nourishment. The Latest Innovation from essie Nail Polish: expressie nail polishes feature our first ever angled polish brush for easy self application with both hands, including your non dominant hand; To switch, simply flip the nail brush and angle it down. Iconic and Trendsetting Colors: from the essie collection, which has produced over a thousand nail polish shades and counting. essie nail polish takes from fashion and cultural trends to make manicure possibilities endless.
